name: Duelity - a card game
description:
How to play

Both players start the game with 25 lifes. You win the game, when your opponent has no lifes left. To achieve this goal you play cards which can either: 

  •  Heal yourself 
  • Increase your Devotion to one of the elements
  • Deal Dmg. to your opponent (often Dmg. increases with devotion)
  • Gain Armor (which negates damages done by spells)
  • Flip Cards
  • Give you a permanent bonus

There are two types of cards:

  • Permanents: You can keep up to two permanent cards. A permanent always triggers when any player play a card of the same element
  • Spells: Get executed immediately

There are currently four supported elements. Each element has it´s counterpart on the backside of the card

  • Water <--> Fire
  • Earth <--> Wind

Game created by 
Lukas Mayer, Linn Spilker & Yannick Pfeiffer
